import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './index.css'; const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('RevOps'); function App() { const [menuOpen, setMenuOpen] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { document.documentElement.style.scrollBehavior = 'smooth'; const elements = document.querySelectorAll('[data-animate]'); const observer = new IntersectionObserver(entries => { entries.forEach(entry => { if (entry.isIntersecting) { entry.target.classList.remove('opacity-0', 'translate-y-10'); entry.target.classList.add('opacity-100', 'translate-y-0'); } }); }); elements.forEach(el => observer.observe(el)); return () => observer.disconnect(); }, []); return (

Cut Through the Noise.

What Makes Relam Different

{/* Market Intelligence

Market Intelligence for Your Industry

*/} {/* How Relam Works */}

Reliable Intelligence Built on Real Context

Relam combines your internal sales knowledge, proprietary datasets, and live market monitoring delivering insights that drive revenue growth.

{/* Built for Revenue Teams */} {/* Built for Revenue Teams - FullStory style */}

Built for Revenue Teams

Relam.ai delivers contextual competitive intelligence tailored for every role driving revenue from RevOps to Sales to CXOs.

{/* Tabs */}
{['RevOps', 'Sales', 'Account Executives', 'Customer Success', 'Product Marketing', 'CXOs'].map((tab, index) => ( ))}
{/* Tab Content */}
{/* Text Side */}
{activeTab === 'RevOps' && ( <>

Predictable, Insight-Driven Revenue Operations

  • Align go-to-market execution with live competitive shifts.
  • Identify revenue risks and expansion signals early.
  • Build operational dashboards fueled by real-time intelligence.
)} {activeTab === 'Sales' && ( <>

Equip Sales Teams to Close More Deals

  • Receive competitor updates directly inside Slack and CRM.
  • Position value against real-time competitor moves.
  • Speed up deal cycles with context-aware insights.
)} {activeTab === 'Account Executives' && ( <>

Supercharge AEs with Deal-Specific Intel

  • Surface key account moves and competitor risks instantly.
  • Tailor pitches based on fresh competitive signals.
  • Close deals with sharper battlecards powered by live data.
)} {activeTab === 'Customer Success' && ( <>

Reduce Churn, Grow Accounts

  • Detect churn risks early via customer signal monitoring.
  • Find upsell paths from competitor product weaknesses.
  • Strengthen QBRs with market-backed recommendations.
)} {activeTab === 'Product Marketing' && ( <>

Align Messaging to Win More Markets

  • Real-time competitor messaging analysis.
  • Launch winning campaigns based on market moves.
  • Close messaging gaps faster across product lines.
)} {activeTab === 'CXOs' && ( <>

Executive Visibility Into Growth & Risk

  • Instant growth signals surfaced to leadership.
  • Monitor competitor strategies and market shifts daily.
  • Make strategic GTM decisions faster with better data.
)}
{/* Image/Illustration Side */}
{/* How Relam.ai Works */}

How Relam.ai Powers Smarter Growth

{/* Vertical Dotted Line */}
{/* Steps */}
{/* Step 1 */}
{/* SVG */}

Learn From Internal Docs

Upload decks, battlecards, and sales plays. Relam tailors insights to your unique GTM strategy.

{/* Step 2 */}
{/* SVG */}

Tap Proprietary External Data

Aggregate trusted signals from competitor sites, funding news, market movements, and more.

{/* Step 3 */}
{/* SVG */}

Contextual AI & ML Summarization

Proprietary models filter, prioritize, and summarize insights aligned to your revenue targets.

{/* Step 4 */}
{/* SVG */}

Deliver to Slack & CRM

Insights appear automatically in Slack channels and CRM pipelines no manual work required.

{/* Recent Insights */}

Recent Insights

Explore our latest research on market trends, competitive dynamics, and revenue growth.
